__init__(self, radio, timerMux, schedule, id)
(Constructor)

source code 

Initialise MAC.

Parameters:
  • radio - The Radio to be used by the MAC.
  • timerMux - TimerMultiplexer to be used by the MAC.
  • schedule - Schedule object giving transmission scheduling.
  • id - The device ID of this node.
